description.zh-cn: 中国企业家，中国共产党党员。前长虹电器股份有限公司董事长兼总经理，在其领导下长虹被誉为“中国的松下”。曾获全国优秀企业家、中国商界十大风云人物、日经亚洲大奖、改革先锋等称号。曾任四川省政府顾问、第八届全国人大代表、第十届全国政协常委。
description.en: A Chinese entrepreneur and a member of the Communist Party of China. He is the former chairman and general manager of Changhong Electric Co., Ltd., which was hailed as the 'Matsushita of China' under his leadership. He has received titles such as National Outstanding Entrepreneur, Top Ten Influential Figures in China's Business Community, Nikkei Asia Prize, and Reform Pioneer. He served as an advisor to the Sichuan Provincial Government, a deputy to the 8th National People's Congress, and a member of the Standing Committee of the 10th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

zh-cn: 长虹电器股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 一家位于中国四川省的消费电子产品公司。
description.en: A consumer electronics company based in Sichuan, China.

description.zh-cn: 授予中国企业家的荣誉称号。
description.en: An honorary title awarded to Chinese entrepreneurs.

nodes.id: 中国商界十大风云人物

zh-cn: 中国商界十大风云人物
en: Top Ten Influential Figures in China's Business Community

description.zh-cn: 授予中国商界杰出人物的荣誉称号。
description.en: An honorary title awarded to outstanding figures in the Chinese business community.

description.zh-cn: 由日本经济新闻社设立，旨在表彰为亚洲发展做出贡献的个人或团体。
description.en: Established by Nikkei Inc. to recognize individuals or groups who have contributed to the development of Asia.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家权力机关。
description.en: The highest state organ of power in the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会
en: National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议的全国性组织。
description.en: The national organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 倪润峰是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Ni Runfeng is a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 倪润峰曾任长虹电器股份有限公司董事长兼总经理，于2004年辞去所有职务。
description.en: Ni Runfeng served as the chairman and general manager of Changhong Electric Co., Ltd., and resigned from all positions in 2004.

description.zh-cn: 倪润峰于1944年2月出生于山东荣成。
description.en: Ni Runfeng was born in Rongcheng, Shandong in February 1944.

description.zh-cn: 倪润峰于1967年毕业于大连理工大学机械制造专业。
description.en: Ni Runfeng graduated from Dalian University of Technology in 1967 with a major in Mechanical Manufacturing.

description.zh-cn: 1994年，倪润峰获得第五届全国优秀企业家金球奖称号。
description.en: In 1994, Ni Runfeng was awarded the title of the 5th National Outstanding Entrepreneur Golden Globe Award.

relationships.source: 中国商界十大风云人物

description.zh-cn: 1996年，倪润峰被评为95中国商界十大风云人物。
description.en: In 1996, Ni Runfeng was named one of the Top Ten Influential Figures in China's Business Community of 1995.

description.zh-cn: 1998年，倪润峰获得第三届日经亚洲大奖经济界奖，是亚洲获此奖的第一人。
description.en: In 1998, Ni Runfeng received the 3rd Nikkei Asia Prize for Economics, becoming the first person in Asia to win this award.

description.zh-cn: 在倪润峰的领导之下，长虹获得全国首批、四川省第一家一级企业称号，被誉为“中国的松下”。
description.en: Under the leadership of Ni Runfeng, Changhong became one of the first national-level and the first Grade-A enterprise in Sichuan Province, and was hailed as the 'Matsushita of China'.

description.zh-cn: 倪润峰从长虹离职后曾任四川省政府顾问。
description.en: After leaving Changhong, Ni Runfeng served as an advisor to the Sichuan Provincial Government.

description.zh-cn: 2018年12月，中国共产党授予倪润峰改革先锋称号。
description.en: In December 2018, the Communist Party of China awarded Ni Runfeng the title of Reform Pioneer.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 2018年12月，中华人民共和国国务院授予倪润峰改革先锋称号。
description.en: In December 2018, the State Council of the People's Republic of China awarded Ni Runfeng the title of Reform Pioneer.

description.zh-cn: 倪润峰是第八届全国人大代表。
description.en: Ni Runfeng was a deputy to the 8th National People's Congress.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

position.en: Member of the Standing Committee of the 10th National Committee

description.zh-cn: 倪润峰是第十届全国政协常委。
description.en: Ni Runfeng was a member of the Standing Committee of the 10th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.
